message: Hi Name,
We are pleased to send you this exclusive invitation to join us for our final Justia Webinars presentation of 2022!

Join senior members of our SEO team on Wednesday, December 7 at 2:00 pm ET (1:00 pm CT, 12:00 pm MT, 11 am PT) for a roundtable discussion on the Law Firm SEO in 2022, including ranking algorithm changes, changes to the search results pages, updates to Google Analytics, and more SEO news! As a bonus, we’re peering inside our crystal ball to let you know what we expect on the horizon in 2023.
This presentation is 100% free for all Justia Connect members – that means you! RSVP today to take advantage of this learning opportunity.
